title: Ill pay you 5$ if you help me !!!
body: Wehn i login into league and i leave it on the cleint for like 2 mins it shows me a windows saying "Connection Timeout: The request to the PVP.net server timed out." its annoying and when i finish a game it shows up 2 so idk what to do i cant even see what grade i got did i get a chest i cant see any of that please help me!!!! I cant even see my end screen help please!!!

replies.body:
I usually hear of these symptoms when there's an issue between your PC and our servers. This could be caused by a number of things, however, the most frequent are incompatible network configurations. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through some steps that usually resolve these issues, so I strongly recommend giving them a go.

Let me know if this ended up resolving the issue.
